aboutMe.description: I'm a developer passionate about developing Full Stack applications with free and open source technologies from Colombia with experience in the design, development, analysis and implementation of monolithic and client-server applications. With knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, relational and non-relational databases; SonarQube, Docker, CI / CD (GitLab) using agile methodologies.
